ServerSocketApplication - Class in zfrisv.cs309
Begins the UnoGame multiplayer server-handler.

Sets up the multiplayer game and broadcasts it to all the players
simulateTurn(UnoCard) - Static method in class zfrisv.cs309.ServerSocketApplication
